body:
As a core developer I want every configuration schema to be checked for correctness during CI tests so that I won't merge PRs with invalid configuration schema.

### Rationale

See https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/10236#issuecomment-450804804 for the originating request on this feature and https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/9878#issuecomment-450749931 for a bug report related to an accidental merge of an invalid schema.

### Description

Configuration schema are valid JSON data and can be checked against a JSON schema meta-schema.

### Additional information
Draft 4 meta-schema can be found [here](http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema)
title: Check schema correctness during CI tests
